body.h2: Can I use UISDK-build with non-javascript project?
body.p: I don't see why not, as long as your project environment supports node.js.
body.h2: What else is shipped with UISDK-build package?
body.p:
As of version 0.0.6 package contains:
Nodejs executable (Linux and Windows)
Phantomjs executable (Linux and Windows) - headless web browser
Jasmine library - javascript based testing framework
JSCore executable (Linux and Windows)- provides test coverage for javascript based tests (compatible with Jasmine)
